templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here: https://www.statelinetack.com/content/rewards/about/?utm_campaign=Concierge&utm_medium=sms&utm_source=attentive&externalId=3OACo

templates.name: What is the best way to size a helmet?
templates.content: Using a soft fabric measuring tape, wrap it around the widest part of your head (over your hair). It should follow a line about 3/4 inch above your eyebrows, just above the ear line, and around the bump at the back of your head. Then compare those measurements to the size chart for the helmet you are interested in purchasing.

templates.name: Discount doesn't apply to certain items
templates.content: Your cart will show the discount if your item is eligible for it. Some items unfortunately can't have discounts applied based on manufacturers policy.

templates.name: What's the highest temperature OEQ can withstand?
templates.content: OEQ doesn't have a temperature rating system. Cold weather comfort is largely dependent on personal temperature tolerances. These boots are lined in a plush synthetic fleece, and if paired with the appropriate sock, can provide sufficient comfort in colder weather conditions. Please check out the other reviews on this boot from very happy riders.

templates.name: I need a smaller size
templates.content: You're welcome to check our mini supplies collection here: https://www.statelinetack.com/miniature-tack-and-supplies/2439/

templates.name: How do I submit a price match request?
templates.content: Price match requests must be submitted online. Please click on the red '$ Price Match Request' link on the product page after the size/color is selected to submit your request.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.statelinetack.com/clearance/2000/

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/state_line_tack/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/SLTcom/

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please submit your request using this link: https://www.statelinetack.com/CS/Feedback.aspx or feel free to call this number 1-844-384-6814. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'll be more than happy to help out!

templates.name: Do you price match?
templates.content: Yes, we do! You can check out the details of the program at the following link: https://slt.attn.tv/sl/bl5k_2yK

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We usually ship via USPS and once shipped, it will take 7-10 business days domestically, depending on the method you choose at checkout.  Most in-stock items are usually delivered within 5-7 business days as long as the order is placed before 2pm EST.

templates.name: What does the "list price" mean?
templates.content: The list price is the manufacturer's suggested retail price. Please note this may not be the regular retail price.

templates.name: Do you ship to APO/FPO/P.O?
templates.content: We gladly ship within the 50 United States, APO/FPO addresses, Canada, Guam, PO Boxes, Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands.

templates.name: Can saddle pads be monogrammed?
templates.content: We no longer offer that option, so we would highly suggest finding someone in your local area to have it done.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to contact us via this link: https://www.statelinetack.com/CS/Feedback.aspx Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and sign up for our program here: https://www.statelinetack.com/Affiliate.aspx

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to contact us via this link: https://www.statelinetack.com/CS/Feedback.aspx Our team is happy to help.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.statelinetack.com/CS/Returns.aspx

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: Free economy shipping applies only to select items and this will be indicated on the product page. Additional exclusions may apply for excessively heavy or large items and will be noted during checkout. Also note the free shipping offer is valid only on domestic orders and may not be combined with other discounts/offers.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-844-384-6814 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: Please call us at 1-888-809-0751 to obtain a Return Authorization Number (RA#) and shipping instructions.

templates.name: Blanket size for horses
templates.content: Can I have the measurements of your horse? I'd be happy to check for you! You can also reference our size chart here: https://www.statelinetack.com/ContentFiles/Associated_Content/sizingchart23.pdf

templates.name: Order Status and Tracking
templates.content: You can check the status of your order here: https://www.statelinetack.com/Login.aspx

templates.name: Post purchase inquiries
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please submit your request using this link: https://www.statelinetack.com/CS/Feedback.aspx or feel free to call this number 1-844-384-6814. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help you here!

templates.name: I get an error when I enter the e-gift certificate
templates.content: Please be sure the e-gift certificate's 9 digit claim code is being entered in the payment section during checkout. If the claim code is entered into the promo/catalog code box in the shopping cart, you will receive an expired/invalid error message.

templates.name: Do I have to pay for return shipping?
templates.content: Unless the return is being made due to an error with the order on our part (wrong item sent, incorrect quantity, etc.) return shipping is on the customer's expense. We have included a link to our full return policy for your reference: https://slt.attn.tv/a5868XZR1aqW
